Html:
Hi,

I've just came across OpenXML Viewer and it seems like a very neat program. However, the installer from the downloads section isn't compatible with Firefox 12.

Is there any way I could get it to work? Or perhaps is there a new version on the way?

Thanks!

Chris

I'm using open source Microsoft Public License (MS-PL) and this document viewer is suitable in my project.

best regards,

Cheungxin

Greater Document Viewer
